languages.text: "Пастве... страшно. Я помогу им увидеть Императора Неумирающего. Кто Его видит — уже не боится. Они узрят Его в самоотречении. В служении. Исторгнут слабости и страх через причастие болью. Через очистительную аскезу и сакральные кровотечения. Они будут спасены и восстанут обновленными как не ведающие сомнений слуги Его. Его... и твои, Домин'{name}".

"The flock... is afraid. I will help them to see the Undying Emperor. Those who behold Him are no longer afraid. They will recognise Him in self-denial and servitude, and they will expel weakness through sacraments of pain. Through purifying ascesis and sacrificial bloodletting, they will be saved and renewed as His servants who are without doubt. His servants... and yours, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "Пастве... страшно. Я помогу им увидеть Императора Неумирающего. Кто Его видит — уже не боится. Они узрят Его в самоотречении. В служении. Исторгнут слабости и страх через причастие болью. Через очистительную аскезу и сакральные кровотечения. Они будут спасены и восстанут обновленными как не ведающие сомнений слуги Его. Его... и твои, Домин'{name}".

Through purifying aspersion and sacrificial bloodletting, they will be saved and renewed as His servants who are without doubt. His servants... And yours, Enim'{name}."

languages.text: "Die Herde ... hat Angst. Ich werde ihr helfen, den Todlosen Imperator zu sehen. Wer Ihn erblickt, hat keine Angst mehr. Sie werden Ihn in Selbstaufgabe und Knechtschaft erkennen und ihrer Schwäche durch Sakramente des Schmerzes entsagen. Mittels reinigender Askese und opferndem Aderlass werden sie gerettet und als Seine Diener bar jeden Zweifels erneuert werden. Seine Diener ... und Eure, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "The flock... is afraid. I will help them to see the Undying Emperor. Those who behold Him are no longer afraid. They will recognise Him in self-denial and servitude, and they will expel weakness through sacraments of pain. Through purifying ascesis and sacrificial bloodletting, they will be saved and renewed as His servants who are without doubt. His servants... and yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: "Die Herde ... hat Angst. Ich werde ihr helfen, den Todlosen Imperator zu sehen. Wer Ihn erblickt, hat keine Angst mehr. Sie werden Ihn in Selbstaufgabe und Knechtschaft erkennen und ihrer Schwäche durch Sakramente des Schmerzes entsagen. Mittels reinigender Askese und opferndem Aderlass werden sie gerettet und als Seine Diener bar jeden Zweifels erneuert werden. Seine Diener ... und Eure, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: «El rebaño... tiene miedo. Yo les ayudaré a ver al Emperador Inmortal. Quienes contemplen Su efigie perderán todo temor. Le reconocerán en la abnegación y la servidumbre, y repudiarán su debilidad mediante el sacramento del dolor. La purificación ascética y las sangrías expiatorias los salvarán y renovarán como Sus siervos, desprovistos de toda duda. Sus siervos... y los de usted {mf|mismo|misma}, Domin'{name}».
languages.original_text: "The flock... is afraid. I will help them to see the Undying Emperor. Those who behold Him are no longer afraid. They will recognise Him in self-denial and servitude, and they will expel weakness through sacraments of pain. Through purifying ascesis and sacrificial bloodletting, they will be saved and renewed as His servants who are without doubt. His servants... and yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: «El rebaño... tiene miedo. Yo les ayudaré a ver al Emperador Inmortal. Quienes contemplen Su efigie perderán todo temor. Le reconocerán en la abnegación y la servidumbre, y repudiarán su debilidad mediante el sacramento del dolor. La purificación ascética y las sangrías expiatorias los salvarán y renovarán como Sus siervos, desprovistos de toda duda. Sus siervos... y los de usted {mf|mismo|misma}, Domin'{name}».

languages.text: 「群衆は…恐れている。彼らが不死の皇帝に会うのを手伝います。あの方を見た者はもはや恐れ知らず。自己否定と服従の心であの方を認識し、痛みの秘跡を通して弱さを追い払います。浄化の自己鍛錬と犠牲の流血を通して、彼らは間違いなくあの方の従者として救われて新しい人間になるのです。あの方の…そしてあなたの従者です、ドミン・{name}」
languages.original_text: "The flock... is afraid. I will help them to see the Undying Emperor. Those who behold Him are no longer afraid. They will recognise Him in self-denial and servitude, and they will expel weakness through sacraments of pain. Through purifying ascesis and sacrificial bloodletting, they will be saved and renewed as His servants who are without doubt. His servants... and yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: 「群衆は…恐れている。彼らが不死の皇帝に会うのを手伝います。あの方を見た者はもはや恐れ知らず。自己否定と服従の心であの方を認識し、痛みの秘跡を通して弱さを追い払います。浄化の自己鍛錬と犠牲の流血を通して、彼らは間違いなくあの方の従者として救われて新しい人間になるのです。あの方の…そしてあなたの従者です、エニム・{name}」

languages.text: “牧群……心怀恐惧，而我会帮助他们看到不死神皇的真容。凡是看到祂真容的人都不再惧怕，人们会通过自省与服役来侍奉祂，依靠痛苦的洗礼驱散心中的软弱。毫无疑问，他们会通过净化的苦行与牺牲的鲜血得到救赎，重生为祂的忠仆……也是您的忠仆，秘者{name}。”
languages.original_text: "The flock... is afraid. I will help them to see the Undying Emperor. Those who behold Him are no longer afraid. They will recognise Him in self-denial and servitude, and they will expel weakness through sacraments of pain. Through purifying ascesis and sacrificial bloodletting, they will be saved and renewed as His servants who are without doubt. His servants... and yours, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: “牧群……心怀恐惧，而我会帮助他们看到不死神皇的真容。凡是看到祂真容的人都不再惧怕，人们会通过自省与服役来侍奉祂，依靠痛苦的洗礼驱散心中的软弱。毫无疑问，他们会通过净化的苦行与牺牲的鲜血得到救赎，重生为祂的忠仆……也是您的忠仆，秘者{name}。”

languages.text: « Les fidèles vivent... dans la crainte. Je vais les aider à voir de leurs yeux l'Empereur immortel. Ceux qui ont le privilège de l'admirer dans toute Sa splendeur ne sont plus tributaires de la peur. Ils Le reconnaîtront dans l'abnégation et la servitude, et ils s'affranchiront de leurs faiblesses par les saints sacrements de la douleur. Par l'ascèse cathartique et le sang versé des sacrifiés, ils seront sauvés et ils réintégreront les rangs de Ses indéfectibles serviteurs. Ses serviteurs... mais aussi les vôtres, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: "The flock... is afraid. I will help them to see the Undying Emperor. Those who behold Him are no longer afraid. They will recognise Him in self-denial and servitude, and they will expel weakness through sacraments of pain. Through purifying ascesis and sacrificial bloodletting, they will be saved and renewed as His servants who are without doubt. His servants... and yours, Domin'{name}."

Par l'ascèse cathartique et le sang versé des sacrifiés, ils seront sauvés et ils réintégreront les rangs de Ses indéfectibles serviteurs. Ses serviteurs... mais aussi les vôtres, Domin'{name}. »

languages.text: "Cemaat korkuyor. Ölmeyen İmparator'u görebilmelerine yardım edeceğim. O'na tanık olanların korkuları yok olur. O'nu nefislerinden feragat ederken ve hizmet ederken tanıyacaklar ve acılı törenlerde zayıflıklarından arınacaklar. Arındırıcı irade sınavlarıyla ve kurban olup kan akıtarak kurtarılacaklar ve O'nun içlerinde şüphe barındırmayan hizmetkârları olarak yenilenecekler. O'nun hizmetkârları ve... Sizin hizmetkârlarınız Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "The flock... is afraid. I will help them to see the Undying Emperor. Those who behold Him are no longer afraid. They will recognise Him in self-denial and servitude, and they will expel weakness through sacraments of pain. Through purifying ascesis and sacrificial bloodletting, they will be saved and renewed as His servants who are without doubt. His servants... and yours, Domin'{name}."
